articles.description: Student-athletes, including Bryce Young, Bo Nix and Aliyah Boston, from roughly 100 universities will be featured on the upcoming cards.
articles.content: Fanatics Collectables and Topps have announced comprehensive agreements to produce collegiate football and basketball trading cards -- partnerships that include nearly 150 universities and, separatel… [+3083 chars]
